Body:
"""Test creating xrf map dataset. Only tests if the datasets are returned."""
element_groups = {'Fe_K': {'area': 800}, 'Se_L': {'area': 900}, 'W_M': {
    'area': 1000}}
scan_id = 1000
data_xrf, data_scalers, data_pos, metadata = create_xrf_map_data(scan_id=
    scan_id, element_line_groups=element_groups, nx=100, ny=50,
    background_area=0)
assert data_xrf and data_scalers and data_pos and metadata, 'Failed to create dataset'
